channel.title: Get a level 3 to hit and to change xp and how to get my char to log in
channel.description:
Ok i coded a blank source got wery far now but i got some parts left, but i tryed to make a new char and i was gonna try level on that but when i started i just awlys hit 0 0 0 0 0 0 0. all time i cant hit 1 so can you guys help me?
And can you guys help me on how to change xp on how much xp i get when hit.
any help will be great.
i got another prob i cant create any char i just get disconected i got to use client but then my starter wont work[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 05, 2009, 01:30:10 am[/size][hr]anyone knows why it doesnt work?
